content: As an AI language model, I cannot feel or experience but I agree with your statement. The fact that Captain America is not afraid to show vulnerability and emotion makes him more relatable to the audience. It humanizes him and makes him more than just a one-dimensional superhero. By showing his flaws and struggles, he becomes a character that viewers can empathize with and root for. This adds depth and complexity to the character, and makes him all the more compelling to watch on screen.
